channel.title: Adding New items to client
channel.description:
I cant find a good tut , im trying to add d claws and d plate to it o.0
Please help!

item.title: Adding New items to client
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“abctest123abc, post:2, topic:266887”]Open up Item.cfg
and type
item = 13664 Dragon_Claws Dragon Claws 250 250 250 250 250 250 250 250 250 250 250 250 250 250 250

You must use custom client otherwise you wont be able to see or use the claws[/quote]

You’re a retard.

@ Gl0wi;

Download the models Here.

Add them into the “models” folder in your client, then login to your server with your client and say out loud:

“add model 11000”
“add model 11001”

That will add the models into your cache.
Next add these ints into class8.java under ‘class8.method203(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183);’:

if (i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 11001; class8.anInt165 = 11000; class8.anInt200 = 11000; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 738; class8.anInt190 = 245; class8.anInt198 = 80; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dragon claws"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A pair of dragon claws.".getBytes(); }

Replace the ‘####’ with the ID you want to give the dragon claws.
Save class8.java, compile, and run your client.

Spawn the ID that you gave the dragon claws before, and you’ll have dragon claws :).

Read full topic

item.description:
@Khan_ZooZoo wrote:

Dude, DL the models, go onto server, type in add model (model id here) and then spawn it after you added the ints… Not hard.
